short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: arxiv.ninja swoops in and randomly re-orders the papers on the arXiv new pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
arxiv.ninja swoops in and randomly re-orders the papers on the arXiv new pages.

It's intended to avoid reader bias towards papers that were submitted first in the current cut-off window.

The only change in version 0.1.3 is an internal technical change (updating to "manifest v3") so that the extension will keep working with Google Chrome in the future.
